message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $150, but that's as low as I can go. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
